means: （小孩般）天真无邪地说话( prattle的现在分词 )
发出连续而无意义的声音

PerfectNetExp.abs: prattling . Let them come ! We shall grind their bones to dust ., 说够了 . 让他们来吧 ! 我们会把他们的骨头都给磨成粉.

list.abs: She went on prattling away , but I had stopped , listening ., 她继续喋喋不休地说 , 但我已不再听了.
That is why I prattle andlightly and hide my heat behind words ., 因此我轻松的说东道西 , 把我的心藏在语言的后面.
That is why I prattle andlightly and hide my heart behind words ., 因此我轻浮地说笑打趣 , 用话语掩藏我的真心.
the most romantic prattle , which has been with you when the man called up to ask : " how ? "最浪漫的情话，是当哪个已经跟你分了手的人打电话来问：“你好吗？”
The water prattled over the rocks ., 水在石上淙淙地流过.

entry.def: If you say that someone prattles on about something, you are criticizing them because they are talking a great deal without saying anything important.

example.ex: Lou prattled on about various trivialities till I wanted to scream...
example.tran: 卢就各种芝麻小事唠叨个没完，后来我烦得都想尖叫了。

example.ex: She prattled on as she drove out to the Highway...
example.tran: 她开车上公路时一直说个没完。

auth_sentence.content: Muriel's vacuous teen-age daughter finally terminated her conceited prattling.
auth_sentence.res_content: Muriel's vacuous teen-age daughter finally terminated her conceited prattling.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Muriel's vacuous teen-age daughter finally terminated her conceited prattling.

auth_sentence.content: Is pure, extra-planetary prattling and nothing but?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is pure, extra-planetary prattling and nothing but?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is pure, extra-planetary prattling and nothing but?

auth_sentence.content: She felt like an adult listening to prattling children and gave them only half her attention.
auth_sentence.res_content: She felt like an adult listening to prattling children and gave them only half her attention.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She felt like an adult listening to prattling children and gave them only half her attention.
